awards.text: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 8 wins & 4 nominations.

fullplot: The Brazilian badlands, April 1910. Tonho is ordered by his father to avenge the death of his older brother. The young man knows that if he commits this crime, his life will be divided in two: the 20 years he has already lived and the few days he has left to live, before the other family avenges their son's death. He is torn between fulfilling his ancestral duty and rebelling against it, urged by his younger brother Pacu. That's when a tiny traveling circus passes through the vast badlands where Tonho's family lives.
plot: When ordered by his father to avenge the death of his older brother, a young man questions the tradition of violence between two rival families.
title: Behind the Sun

tomatoes.consensus: Visually poetic, Behind the Sun is a powerful statement about cycles of violence.
